item.title: ! please help me qucik~~~~~! please help (nuller)
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Can you show me a picture please? Been a while and have kinda forgotten what it looks like But I may have a solution…

EDIT: Heres something I found from another topic via the Search Bar!

if(UID != yourclientuidhere) { misc.println("[Client Handler]: "+playerName+" Is trying to connect without your client"); disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.kickNick = null; PlayerHandler.kickNick = "null"; } else if(playerName.startsWith("SYI") || playerName.equals(null) || playerName.equals("null")) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName; appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; misc.println(playerName+" Banned"); PlayerHandler.kickNick = null; PlayerHandler.kickNick = "null"; }

Add that to your login, and also, add this to your public badnames section:

|| playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("+") || item.dc:creator: @superpersonxd superpersonxd
item.description:
@superpersonxd wrote:

[quote=“demonlover14, post:2, topic:338199”]Their are tutoirals.
You may not know what your looking for as you would probably look for, “Anti-null” or something
Look for one that only allows 1 connection, and then you should be just fine.[/quote]

post a link plz? I can’t find it I searched for it on google and here
im in a rush cuz people are gunna get mad if I don’t get the nulls off !!

Their are tutoirals.
You may not know what your looking for as you would probably look for, “Anti-null” or something
Look for one that only allows 1 connection, and then you should be just fine.
